attributes.action: make it illegal for children under 18 to smoke.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst raising the age for purchase to 18, it still allows and encourages young people to get others to purchase and then by default approves the use of these products. 
It should clearly be against the law for children to smoke and there should be a deterant.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
